topic.title: Developing Custom Plugins
topic.shortdesc: Fast iteration workflow for DITA-OT plugin development.

body.p: The examples/custom-plugin-dev project provides a complete plugin development environment.

section.title: Quick Start
section.codeblock:
cd examples/custom-plugin-dev
# Run development build (download DITA-OT, install plugin, transform) ./gradlew dev
# Auto-rebuild when plugin source changes ./gradlew dev --continuous

section.title: Project Structure
section.codeblock: custom-plugin-dev/ ├── build.gradle ├── src/ │ └── my-custom-plugin/ │ ├── plugin.xml │ ├── css/ │ └── xsl/ └── test-content/ ├── test.ditamap └── topics/

ul.li: Test with different DITA-OT versions using -PditaOtVersion
